evidence.claim: Sonde Health utilizes AWS for their infrastructure.
The company refers to FHIR standards for interoperable health data exchange.
Sonde Health's platform is integrated with various APIs for real-time data processing.
References to HL7 compliance on Sonde Health documentation.
The company discusses HIPAA compliance in their security documentation.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence found of using X12 or clearinghouse functionality in their offerings.
